scripts.postinstall: shx cp -r node_modules/xterm/lib www/xterm && pushd "test/browserRunner" && npm install && popd && git config --global core.longpaths true && shx rm -rf www/node && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/olydis/node www/node && pushd "www/node" && git filter-branch --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter lib HEAD && shx rm -rf .git && popd
